testcase.name: Check the service get method
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def responseGet = read('classpath:karate/request/ResponseGet.json') ..... passed Given path 'users', '2' ................................................... passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responseGet ......................................... passed And assert response.support.text == "To keep ReqRes free, contributions towards server costs are appreciated!" . passed And assert response.data.email == email ................................... passed
